body:
Hi Federico,

This is a bug and this is why it is happening: I [add the path to programs files and docker to os.environ](https://github.com/ladybug-tools/butterfly/blob/master/butterfly/runmanager.py#L80) every time that the analysis is ran without checking if it already exist and in your case after a couple of 100 times it end up being too long. I can fix it quickly today or tomorrow and then you can update it on your machine.

Mostapha
